articles.title: Greetings to Cameroonian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Cameroonian President
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Wednesday sent a message of greeting to Paul Biya, president of the Republic of Cameroon, on the occasion of its 43rd founding anniversary.
					 The message expressed belief that the excellent friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Cameroon would grow stronger in various fields, sincerely wishing the Cameroonian people successes in their efforts to achieve the stability and prosperity of the country under the leadership of the president.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Minister Meets New Tunisian Ambassador
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Minister Meets New Tunisian Ambassador
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minster Ri Su Yong met and had a talk with Tarek Amri, Tunisian ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a courtesy call on him on Wednesday.

articles.title: Underwater Test-fire of Ballistic Missile Is Legitimate Exercise of Right to Self-defence: DPRK
articles.content:
Underwater Test-fire of Ballistic Missile Is Legitimate Exercise of Right to Self-defence: DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and Japanese reactionaries, south Korean puppet authorities and other hostile forces every day let loose invectives against the DPRK over its underwater test-fire of ballistic missile from a strategic submarine. In this regard a spokesman for the Policy Department of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK released a statement clarifying the principled stand of the service personnel and people of the DPRK on Wednesday. 
					 It cannot overlook the sinister aim sought by the hostile forces in taking issue with its legitimate measure to bolster up the self-defence capability as a sovereign state and their provocative behaviors, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The DPRK's underwater test-fire is part of the measures to increase the self-defence capability of its army and people, pursuant to the line of simultaneously developing the two fronts and a new higher level in the development of strategic striking means. 
					
					 It is long since the DPRK's nuclear striking means have entered the stage of producing smaller nukes and diversifying them. 
					
					 The DPRK has reached the stage of ensuring the highest precision and intelligence and best accuracy of not only medium- and short-range rockets but long-range ones.
					
					 It does not hide this. 
					
					 This is the DPRK's just measure for bolstering up the capability for self-defence and a legitimate exercise of its sovereignty which it can never give up simply because someone brands it as a "provocation" or demands a "stop" to it.
					
					 Now that the U.S. and all other undesirable hostile forces kowtowing to it are persistently "threatening" and "blackmailing" the DPRK and stepping up overtly and covertly their brigandish moves to invade it and "bring down its social system", its service personnel and people all out in the drive for defending the security of the country and dignity of the nation will more dynamically push ahead at increasing speed with the plan for bolstering up the defence capability, undeterred by the moves.
					
					 They should no longer dare pull up the DPRK over all its measures for bolstering up its military muscle for self-defence, terming them "provocation" and "threat."
					
					 It is the stand of the DPRK not to allow the U.S. and its allies to brand the former's above-said test-fire as a "provocation" and "threat" to regional peace, pursuant to the "resolution" of the UNSC.
					
					 This is because the UNSC was reduced to the one that yields to the high-handed and arbitrary practices of the U.S., forgetful of its mission to ensure the global peace and security and its duty prescribed in the UN Charter, and the one which has abandoned itself the principles of respect for sovereignty of other countries and non-interference in their internal affairs after dropping the principle of impartiality.
					
					 The U.S. and the Japanese reactionaries, the sworn enemies of the Korean people, the south Korean puppet forces and all other dishonest forces should not forget even a moment that the powerful strike means of the DPRK to defend the dignity and sovereignty of the nation from the reckless moves of the aggressors keen to intrude into its inviolable territory, waters and sky and "bring down its social system" have been placed on alert to hit any target not only from their front and flanks but from any place in their rear.

articles.title: Reckless Remarks of U.S. Secretary of State Denounced
articles.content:
Reckless Remarks of U.S. Secretary of State Denounced
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- The U.S. going reckless in its smear campaign against the DPRK in a bid to get rid of the miserable position it is finding itself due to the total failure in its hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					 In this regard a spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK released a statement on Wednesday.
					
					 While visiting south Korea U.S. Secretary of State Kerry ran the whole gamut of invectives against the DPRK on May 18. He blustered that north Korea is increasing military threats by persistently developing nukes and ballistic missiles, it is necessary to escalate international pressure on it to force it to change its behavior and the world community should jointly react against the state making cyber attack.
					
					 Kerry went the lengths of pulling up the DPRK supreme headquarters in a bid to tarnish the image of the DPRK and justify the bankrupt "human rights" racket against it.
					
					 What Kerry uttered was nothing but the jargon let loose by the loser admitting a total failure of the hostile policy of the Obama Administration towards the DPRK as it was its last-ditch efforts to evade the responsibility for having driven the DPRK-U.S. relations to the worst phase, the spokesman said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. has already been disqualified to talk about dialogue and the nuclear issue due to the anachronistic moves to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK provided the U.S. with a series of opportunities for realizing the denuclearization of the Korean peninsula in the past period. But the U.S. did not roll back its inveterate hostile policy toward the DPRK and missed all the opportunities.
					
					 In January last, the DPRK showed the willingness to put a moratorium on the nuclear test if the U.S. temporarily discontinues the provocative joint military exercises against it. However, the U.S. turned down this offer, scuppering the last chance to settle the nuclear issue. 
					
					 No progress can be made in the DPRK-U.S. relations unless the U.S. drops its inveterate and chronic repugnance and its hostile policy towards the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. should fundamentally change its viewpoint on the DPRK in order to stem the current trend of vicious cycle of confrontation and tension.
					
					 The Obama Administration will have to disappear from the arena, leaving the ill fame as the arch criminal torpedoing the denuclearization of the Korean peninsula and escalating the tension on it.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised not to forget that its acts of getting on the nerves of the DPRK would only add to its pain.

articles.title: DPRK-Russia Friendship Symposium
articles.content:
DPRK-Russia Friendship Symposium
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- A DPRK-Russia friendship symposium took place at Kim Il Sung University on May 19 to mark the year for friendship between the two countries.
					 The symposium, the first of its kind, exchanged the achievements and views made by Kim Il Sung University and Russia's universities in the education and study of Korean and Russian languages and laid a scientific foundation for intensifying the philological education and study between the two countries.
					
					 It also helped deepen the bilateral friendship and promote academic exchanges in a many-sided way.
					
					 Yun Nam, dean of a faculty of Kim Il Sung University, told KCNA that the participants in the symposium came to have a common understanding that the close cooperation between educational institutions of the two countries would promote the development of the DPRK-Russia friendly and cooperative relations. And he expressed hope that Kim Il Sung University and various universities of Russia would make new successes in the educational and scientific studies and intensify their many-sided academic exchanges.
					
					 V. A. Stepanenko, rector of the Russian Language and Literature Institute under Moscow Lomonosov State University, noted that many teachers of Russia had worked in the DPRK with good impressions.
					
					 The development of Korean version of general textbook "The Way to Russia" is associated with the feats of DPRK students who studied at universities of Russia, he said, hoping that the symposium would serve as a new occasion in developing the joint work between the two countries.
					
					 Alexandr Matsegora, Russian ambassador to the DPRK, said the symposium marked an important occasion in further promoting the cooperation and exchange between universities of the two countries, adding that Kim Il Sung University has long and strong ties of friendship with many universities of Russia.

articles.title: Ground-breaking Ceremony of Construction in Wonsan Area Held
articles.content:
Ground-breaking Ceremony of Construction in Wonsan Area Held
 Wonsan, May 20 (KCNA) -- The Wonsan area will turn into a world-famous tourist city under the plan of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK). 
					 A ground-breaking ceremony took place in Kalma Street on Wednesday.
					
					 Present there were Vice-Premier Kim Yong Jin, officials concerned, builders and citizens of Wonsan.
					
					 A reporter and speakers said it was the lifetime wishes and behests of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il to spruce up Wonsan area. 
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un launched a big operation for building Wonsan area into a world famous tourist city, model of city formation, with noble intention to bring about a fresh turn in building a highly civilized socialist nation and dynamically aroused the whole party and country to the drive for doing so, they said.
					
					 They called for launching vigorous campaigns to carry out the behests of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and defending the party's policies to powerfully demonstrate the might of Songun Korea in construction once again. 
					
					 At the end of the ceremony they started projects including dwelling houses at the entrance of Kalma Street in Wonsan City.

articles.title: Delegation to International Women's Grand March Tours Pyongyang
articles.content:
Delegation to International Women's Grand March Tours Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- A delegation to take part in the 2015 international women's grand march for the reunification and peace in Korea visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, on Wednesday.
					 Being briefed on the old home in Mangyongdae, the guests looked round historic relics there.
					
					 The delegation also visited the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill, Kyongsang Kindergarten, Okryu Children's Hospital and the Breast Tumor Institute of the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital on the same day.

articles.title: Scientific Research Successes Gained in Field of Construction
articles.content:
Scientific Research Successes Gained in Field of Construction
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- Researches have gained dynamism in the DPRK to usher in a heyday in construction by dint of science and technology.
					 Scientific research and education institutions in the field of construction have contributed to developing the construction designing and building operation and ensuring the home production of finishing building materials.
					
					 The architectural designing has made rapid progress to build dwelling houses and educational and cultural facilities as monumental creations in the era of the Workers' Party.
					
					 Different units including Pyongyang University of Architecture and the Pyongyang Architectural Information Technology Bureau presented peculiar miniatures by deepening the research on the use of natural energies in line with the requirement of the party's policy and world trend of the development of architecture.
					
					 Researchers of the Architectural Engineering Branch of the State Academy of Sciences developed the program for deciding the quantity of overflow dam concrete tamping of the cascade power stations along the River Chongchon by 3-D modeling.

articles.title: DPRK Registers Successes in Introducing Water-saving Farming Methods
articles.content:
DPRK Registers Successes in Introducing Water-saving Farming Methods 
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- Cooperative farms across the DPRK are widely introducing advanced rice-growing methods that consume remarkably less water.
					 According to information available, the new methods are being introduced into nearly 90 percent of rice fields in the country this year.
					
					 The new water-saving farming methods would cut down about 8 500 hectares of rice seedbeds, helping save a huge amount of rice seeds.
					
					 Agricultural officials across the country organized a meticulous material preparation to apply the new farming methods on a large scale.
					
					 The cooperative farms in South Hwanghae Province that had been visited by the leaders are taking the lead in it.
					
					 Many cooperative farms in North Hwanghae Province such as the Migok Cooperative Farm in Sariwon City taught leading officials new agricultural technique as part of the push to massively introduce the new farming methods.
					
					 There held in counties of South Hamgyong Province a passing-on- technique session, experience-sharing meeting and show for the technical officials.
					
					 All the cooperative farms in North Phyongan Province increased the acres growing rice by new methods.
					
					 Towns and counties of Kangwon Province are brisk with the work to select high-yielding rice seeds for the introduction of the advanced farming methods.
					
					 The agricultural officials and workers are making further successes in the course of applying the new scientific farming methods.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Mandarins' Reckless Remarks on DPRK's Nukes
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams U.S. Mandarins' Reckless Remarks on DPRK's Nukes
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- The U.S. ambassador to south Korea were recently reported to have said as regards the denuclearization that if north Korea takes landmark measures, it can improve its relations with the U.S. and head for "peace and prosperity". 
					 Meanwhile, the special envoy of the U.S. Department of State for the six-way talks described its north Korea policy as a strategy of dialogue and pressure, blustering that denuclearization would help achieve "prosperity and stability" but when it is persistently disregarded, north Korea will come under heavier pressure. 
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes in an article in this regard:
					
					 The U.S. and its followers are trying to create impression that they are concerned for the denuclearization of the Korean peninsula but it is nothing but a foolish trick to wrest a concession and compromise from the DPRK which is bolstering up its war deterrence. 
					
					 The Korean people know well which is the way of achieving peace and prosperity of the Korean peninsula without an advice from the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. is foolishly seeking to denuclearize and stifle the DPRK. However, the U.S. would be well advised to clearly know that the DPRK is neither Iraq nor Libya. 
					
					 The DPRK would like to declare once again that its nuclear force serves as the nation's treasure which can never be abandoned nor be bartered for anything as long as there are imperialists on the globe and nuclear threat to the DPRK persists. 
					
					 Peace and prosperity depends on bolstering up the nuclear force. Neither pressure nor blackmail nor appeasement can ever stop the DPRK from dynamically advancing, pursuant to the line of simultaneously developing the two fronts.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Regime's Sycophancy towards Outside Forces Brings Only Shame: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Regime's Sycophancy towards Outside Forces Brings Only Shame: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- The times have undergone a dramatic change and the world has advanced far, but the south Korean puppet authorities are selling off the nation's interests to outside forces in a bid to stay in power. For this, they are suffering all sorts of disgrace.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday observes this in an article:
					
					 As proven by the recent revision of the "U.S.-Japan defence cooperation guidelines," the south Korean puppet group, a faithful lackey of the U.S., is now finding itself at a loss, driven into an abyss of diplomatic isolation, as the U.S. zealously backed Japan's military expansion for reinvasion. 
					
					 Pursuant to its strategy for Asia domination, the U.S. is massively beefing up its military muscle in Asia while neighboring countries around the Korean peninsula are taking strong counter-actions against its move. Sandwiched between them, the south Korean authorities' "balanced diplomacy" has proved to be disgraceful one. Consequently, they are now hit hard from all sides, derided and censured by the people for their diplomatic incompetence.
					
					 The south Korean puppet group, no more than a colonial servant of the U.S., deserves this deplorable plight as it is bereft of sovereignty. It is a sealed fate of the sycophants and traitors antagonizing the compatriots in the north and depending on outside forces.
					
					 The south Korean people are subject to disgrace and insult, peace on the Korean peninsula is at peril and the Korean nation can not live in peace even a moment because of the wicked traitors who make company with the nation's sworn enemy to hurt the compatriots in the DPRK and are hell-bent on the cooperation in the war exercises against it.
					
					 The south Korean authorities, left alone after suffering shame in international arena for behaving without any principle, bound to their shackling alliance with the U.S., have brought only bitter disgrace to the nation.

articles.title: Japan Accused of Its Move to Have Industrial Facilities under Its Colonial Rule Registered as Cultural Heritages
articles.content:
Japan Accused of Its Move to Have Industrial Facilities under Its Colonial Rule Registered as Cultural Heritages
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- The Japanese authorities are working hard to have some industrial facilities which bear witness to Japan's harsh colonial rule over Korea registered as world cultural heritages. 
					 Among them are the Mitsubishi Shipyard and the Hashima Coal Mine where more than 57 000 Koreans were forced to do slave labor and met death.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a commentary observes in this regard:
					
					 It is illogical to register evidence proving the slave labor sites bearing the bitter grudge of Koreans as world cultural heritages, treasures common to mankind. This move is insult and mockery of human civilization.
					
					 This being a hard reality, the Japanese reactionaries shamelessly asserted that their action was taken according to the recommendation made by the UNESCO advisory body and this had nothing to do with the forcible conscription, the commentary says, adding:
					
					 The above-said action is little short of the shameless move to distort and deny Japan's past history and embellish the hideous crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists against humanity.
					
					 Japan made an application calling for registering as world cultural heritage the suicide note and letter written by a member of the "Kamikaze of the Imperial Japanese Army" preserved in a hall in Kagoshima Prefecture last year.
					
					 This is the sinister aim sought by the Japanese reactionaries to cover up the traces of crimes, forced labor and massacre and divert elsewhere the attention of public opinion at home and abroad calling for settlement of the past wrongdoings under the pretext of cultural heritage.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries can never cover up their sinister intention to infuse into all Japanese the venomous idea of militarism by highly praising and propagating their aggression and crimes under the veil of "cultural heritage".

articles.title: Minju Joson Urges Japan to Settle Its Past Crimes as Early as Possible
articles.content:
Minju Joson Urges Japan to Settle Its Past Crimes as Early as Possible
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, a former journalist of Asahi Shimbun said in a lecture held at an American university that the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese army is historical truth, urging the Japanese government to apologize for it without fail.
					 The said Japanese journalist personally covered the testimony made by a victim of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese army and reported the story before any others.
					
					 Minju Joson Wednesday in a commentary observes in this regard:
					
					 He called for the admission and apology for Japan's past crimes after flying into the U.S. as he was clearly aware that its past sexual slavery was undeniable historical truth and it was legal and moral responsibility for it to make honest apology for those crimes.
					
					 It is historical truth which admits of no argument that the above-said sexual slavery was unprecedented hideous crime against humanity.
					
					 It is human ethics that a criminal is obliged to apologize to his victim and ask for pardon.
					
					 However, Japan's attitude towards its past crimes arouses disappointment and astonishment of the international community.
					
					 Japan's foolish acts to embellish its inglorious past make its future gloomier with each passing day.
					
					 Neither the passage of time nor sleight of hand would help Japan evade the blame for its past sexual slavery. There is no way out for Japan to escape the strong pressure of the international community for redressing the history woven with hideous crimes against humanity.
					
					 The only way out for Tokyo is to settle its inglorious past and turn over a new leaf as early as possible.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Hell-bent on Drills Targeting DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Hell-bent on Drills Targeting DPRK
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- South Korean puppet war maniacs are kicking up mad-cap war drills to mount a preemptive attack upon the DPRK.
					 The south Korean puppet navy staged a tactical drill and a guided missile launching drill in the East Sea of Korea, according to south Korean KBS on May 19.
					
					 Involved in the drills sponsored by the First Fleet of the puppet navy were more than 20 warships including Aegis destroyers, submarines and escort ships.
					
					 The war maniacs were busy with the tactical drill to attack the DPRK from waters while firing even ship-to-ship missiles.
					
					 The puppet air force staged a drill of firing Hawk missiles in Taechon firing range, South Chungchong Province on May 13.
					
					 The puppet authorities of Seoul City kicked off Chungmu drills on May 18.

articles.title: S. Korean Newspaper Accuses Regime of Moving to Stamp out Spirit of Kwangju Popular Uprising
articles.content:
S. Korean Newspaper Accuses Regime of Moving to Stamp out Spirit of Kwangju Popular Uprising
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- Kyunghyang Daily News of south Korea carried an editorial on May 17 denouncing the puppet regime for working hard to stamp out the spirit of the Kwangju Popular Uprising.
					 The editorial deplored the on-going situation where false information is being spread to falsify the truth about the May 18 movement for democracy.
					
					 It blamed the Patriots and Veterans Affairs Agency for putting a ban on singing the song "March for Dear Ones" symbolic of the May 18 movement for democracy under the unreasonable pretext that the song "disturbs the unity of people" and for not having it as a memorial song for the May 18 movement in disregard of the resolution of the "National Assembly."
					
					 What Park Geun Hye seeks is to write off the history of the May 18 movement by branding the song as the "song of those following the north," it noted.
					
					 It urged Park not to insult the history of the movement.

articles.title: Chongryon Officials Meet
articles.content:
Chongryon Officials Meet
 Tokyo, May 19 (KNS-KCNA) -- Officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) held a meeting at the Korean Hall in Osaka on May 15 to hold the grand festival of Koreans in Osaka for celebrating the diamond jubilee of the formation of Chongryon. 
					 Present there were Ho Jong Man, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon; Pae Ik Ju, its vice-chairman; Pu Yong Uk, chairman of the Osaka Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon; and other officials of the Chongryon headquarters and branches, Korean youth league and women's league in Japan. 
					
					 Pu Yong Uk bitterly denounced the Japanese police authorities for arresting three Chongryon officials and searching their houses at a time when festive mood is being revved up in the run-up to the diamond jubilee of Chongryon. 
					
					 He called for holding the grand festival of Koreans in Osaka as one of single-minded unity with ardent patriotism and hostility toward the Japanese authorities' moves to stifle Chongryon. 
					
					 Ho Jong Man said the diamond jubilee of Chongryon is an auspicious event in the glorious Kim Jong Un's era and it will provide a turning point in opening up a fresh heyday of the movement of Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: Fascist Action of Japanese Police Authorities Denounced
articles.content:
Fascist Action of Japanese Police Authorities Denounced
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- The Federation of Korean National Economic Workers in China on May 15 said in a statement:
					 The Japanese reactionaries have gone to extremes in its moves against the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), a dignified overseas Koreans' organization of the DPRK.
					
					 Policemen stormed the houses of officials of Chongryon, handcuffed and walked off them in the wake of their repressive action in March last. This was unpardonable unethical action.
					
					 Lurking behind the action was a sinister aim of the Japanese authorities to label Chongryon "an illegal and criminal organization" and create an undesirable atmosphere in the Japanese society at a time when atmosphere of all compatriots to greet the 60th anniversary of Chongryon was running high.
					
					 The federation vehemently censures the remarks made by a spokesperson for the prime minister's residence who claimed that this action was taken on a legal ground.
					
					 The statement stressed that they would rise up in a dynamic struggle against the fascist action of the Japanese reactionaries.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits in Party-building Praised in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits in Party-building Praised in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- The German and Polish organizations posted articles on their websites on May 13 on the occasion of the 51st anniversary of the start of leader Kim Jong Il's work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany posted on its website an article titled "Kim Jong Il, immortal exploits in party-building".
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il started his work at the C.C., the WPK on June 19, 1964.
					
					 He built the WPK into a people's party which formed a harmonious whole with the people and faithfully served them, being fully responsible for their destiny.
					
					 The immortal exploits he performed in party-building will shine forever with socialist Korea winning victories.
					
					 The Polish website "Democratic People's Republic of Korea" posted an article praising the might of the DPRK demonstrating its dignity as an invincible socialist power always inspired by the great leaders.

articles.title: DPRK Introduced in Guinea
articles.content:
DPRK Introduced in Guinea
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- A lecture and film show introducing the DPRK took place at the hospital of the Guinean Defence Ministry on May 13.
					 A vice-director of the hospital gave a lecture titled "Place where 5,000 year-long history of nation lives on."
					
					 He said:
					
					 There is the Pyongyang Folklore Park showing the time-honored history of the Korean nation at the foot of Mt. Taesong in the capital city of the DPRK.
					
					 The park is divided into the general history education area, the historic relics exhibition area, the modern times area, the folklore village area, the folklore games area, etc. Visitors can watch real sizes or miniatures of cultural sites and relics created by the Korean nation from ancient times to modern times.
					
					 In a word, the 5,000 year-long history of the Korean nation lives on in the park. 
					
					 The participants of the film show watched Korean film "Korea Shining with Time-honored History."

articles.title: British Bodies Denounce Japanese Authorities' Suppression of Chongryon
articles.content:
British Bodies Denounce Japanese Authorities' Suppression of Chongryon
 Pyongyang, May 20 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK made public a joint statement on May 14 denouncing the Japanese authorities for their suppression of officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon).
					 On May 12 the Japanese police authorities hurled many policemen into an operation to arrest officials of Chongryon and search their houses, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Chongryon is playing the role of a diplomatic mission of the DPRK in Japan while protecting the democratic national rights of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 Therefore, the arrest of Chongryon officials is an act of encroaching upon the rights of Koreans in Japan and a blatant challenge to the dignity and honor of the DPRK.
					
					 It is also a dangerous act of blocking the way for normalizing the relations between the DPRK and Japan and escalating tensions in Northeast Asia.
					
					 The statement strongly demanded the Japanese authorities set free all the illegally detained Chongryon officials.
					
					 It called on all progressive people to stage an international solidarity movement in defence of the rights of the Koreans in Japan.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita a su par camerunes
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita a su par camerunes
Pyongyang, 20 de mayo (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, remitio el dia 20 un mensaje de felicitacion a Paul Biya, presidente de la Republica del Camerun, en ocasion del 43o aniversario de la fundacion de este pais africano.
					En su misiva, el remitente expresa su conviccion de que las excelentes relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre la RPDC y el Camerun se ampliaran y se desarrollaran aun mas en varios sectores y desea de todo corazon exitos al pueblo camerunes en sus esfuerzos por lograr la estabilidad y la prosperidad del pais bajo la direccion del destinatario.

articles.title: Lanzamiento de prueba de proyectil balistico es ejercicio de soberania, apunta DP de CDN de RPDC
articles.content:
Lanzamiento de prueba de proyectil balistico es ejercicio de soberania, apunta DP de CDN de RPDC
Pyongyang, 20 de mayo (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que los reaccionarios norteamericanos, japoneses y surcoreanos y otras fuerzas hostiles cuestionan cada dia el lanzamiento de prueba de proyectil balistico de submarino estrategico de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el portavoz del Departamento de Politica del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC publico el dia 20 una declaracion exponiendo la posicion de principios del ejercito y pueblo coreanos. 
					No podemos dar vistas gordas a las malas entranas y la actitud provocativa de las fuerzas hostiles que cuestionan tanto la medida de fortalecimiento de la capacidad de autodefensa del Estado soberano, senala la nota y continua:
					
					El lanzamiento de prueba de proyectil balistico de submarino estrategico de la RPDC es un eslabon de sus medidas para el fortalecimiento de la capacidad de autodefensa nacional, de acuerdo con la linea de desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la de las fuerzas armadas nucleares, y es nueva etapa del desarrollo de los medios de ataque estrategicos. 
					
					Ya hace mucho tiempo la RPDC realizo la minimizacion y la diversificacion de los medios de ataque nuclear. 
					
					No ocultamos lo que el nivel intelectual y de precision de los cohetes de largo alcance, para no hablar de los otros de medio y corto alcance, puede garantizar el optimo porcentaje de impacto.
					
					No podemos renunciar el fortalecimiento de la capacidad de autodefensa nacional, aunque alguien lo acuse de "provocacion" y demande "suspenderlo" porque es el ejercicio  de la soberania nacional. 
					
					En el mundo actual siguen la "amenaza" y el "chantaje" anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles y se tornan cada dia mas abiertas sus agresiones y maniobras gangsteriles tendentes a "derrocar el regimen" norcoreano. 
					
					En tal circunstancia, el plan de fortalecimiento de la capacidad de defensa nacional de nuestro ejercito y pueblo, levantados para intensificar la defensa nacional del pais y defender la seguridad y la dignidad de la nacion, se promovera vertiginosamente sin vacilacion alguna. 
					
					EE.UU. y otras fuerzas hostiles serviles al imperio no deben cuestionar  atrevidamente como "provocacion" y "amenaza" todas las medidas de la RPDC por el fortalecimiento de la capacidad de autodefensa nacional. 
					
					La RPDC tiene la posicion de no tolerar nunca el proceder de EE.UU. y sus satelites que cuestionan el lanzamiento de prueba del proyectil balistico de submarino estrategico como "provocacion" y "amenaza" a la paz de la region tomando como "norma" la "resolucion" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU.
					
					Es porque el CS de la ONU se ha convertido en el aparato que actua segun el despotismo y las arbitrariedades de EE.UU. olvidando su mision de asegurar la paz y la seguridad del mundo y su deber anotado en la Carta y abandono por si mismo la imparcialidad, el equilibrio, los principios de respeto a la soberania y de no intervencion en los asuntos internos.
					
					 Los reaccionarios yanquis y japoneses, enemigos jurados del pueblo coreano, los titeres surcoreanos y todas las fuerzas malsanas no deben olvidar ni un momento que nuestros poderosos medios de ataque preparados para frustrar las maniobras de los agresores que abrigan la ilusion del "derrumbe de regimen" apuntando nuestro sagrado territorio, mar y espacio aereo jurisdiccionales y para defender la dignidad y la soberania de la nacion, estan en estado de guerra para tirar balas certeras en cualquier lugar tanto por el frente y por el flanco como por la espalda.

articles.title: MINREX denuncia nuevo disparate anti-RPDC de secretario de Estado de EE.UU.
articles.content:
MINREX denuncia nuevo disparate anti-RPDC de secretario de Estado de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 20 de mayo (ACNC) -- Con respecto a que Estados Unidos acusa a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea a fin de liberarse de su situacion tragica causada por el fracaso total de la politica hostil a esta, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC hizo publica el dia 20 una declaracion. 
					El pasado dia 18, el secretario de Estado norteamericano, Kerry, de vista en el Sur de Corea, calumnio a la RPDC diciendo que ella aumenta la amenaza persiguiendo de continuo el desarrollo de las armas nucleares y misiles balisticos, es necesario intensificar la presion internacional anti-RPDC para hacerle cambiar la accion y la sociedad internacional debe hacer frente conjunto a un Estado que cometa el ataque cibernetico, senala el documento y prosigue:
					
					Y el pretendio manchar el prestigio de la RPDC y justificar el alboroto de presion de DDHH anti-RPDC disparateando que "el gobierno del Norte de Corea es uno de los mas virulentos que desprecian los derechos humanos y a los seres humanos. 
					
					Tales disparates de Kerry no pasa de ser esfuerzos agonicos por eludir la culpabilidad de la ruptura de las relaciones RPDC-EE.UU. de hoy y una queja de vencido que reconoce el fracaso total de la politica sobre la RPDC de la administracion Obama. 
					
					EE.UU. ya perdio la calificacion para hablar del dialogo y del problema nuclear, debido a sus anacronicas maniobras de aplastamiento anti-RPDC. 
					
					En el pasado, la RPDC preparo varias oportunidades para realizar la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana, pero EE.UU. perdio todas ocasiones sin abandonar hasta el fin la inveterada politica hostil contra ella.
					
					 Aunque en enero pasado la RPDC demostro la disposicion de interrumpir la prueba nuclear si EE.UU. cese los ejercicios militares conjuntos de caracter provocativo contra ella, este lo nego perdiendo hasta la ultima oportunidad para la solucion del problema nuclear.
					
					 Mientras EE.UU. no abandone el arraigado sentimiento de veto y la politica hostil contra la RPDC, no habra ningun avance en las relaciones entre ambos paises.
					
					  Para cambiar la corriente de la actualidad en que sigue la circulacion viciosa de confrontacion y la agravacion de tension, EE.UU. debe corregir radicalmente desde el punto de vista sobre la RPDC.
					
					  La administracion de Obama desaparecera en la escena dejando la "herencia", o sea la palabra autor que frustro cabalmente la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana y agravo escalonadamente la situacion de esta peninsula.
					
					  EE.UU. debe tener presente que cuanto mas ofenda a la RPDC, tanto mas esta le ofendera.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena intencion malsana de Japon
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena intencion malsana de Japon
Pyongyang, 20 de mayo (ACNC) -- Las autoridades japonesas maniobran obstinadamente para registrar como patrimonio cultural del mundo varios establecimientos industriales relacionados con la historia criminal de la dominacion colonial sobre Corea.
					Entre ellos, figuran el astillero de Mitsubishi y la mina de carbon de Hashima en que mas de 57 mil coreanos murieron al cabo del trabajo forzoso.
					
					Tales actos de los nipones devienen el insulto y burla a la civilizacion de la humanidad.
					
					Comienza asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual divulgado el dia 20 y prosigue:
					
					Sin embargo, los reaccionarios japoneses se portan cinicamente diciendo que ellos mismos actuan segun el consejo del organo consultivo de UNESCO y el caso no tiene que ver con el trabajo forzado.
					
					La conducta de Japon es un eslabon de las maniobras descaradas para tergiversar y negar la historia de su pasado y embellecer los crimenes antieticos de gran tamano cometidos por el imperialismo japones.
					
					En el ano pasado tambien, Japon presento la solicitud exigiendo registrar como patrimonio cultural del mundo el testamento, la carta y otros de un miembro de Kamikaze (comando suicida de Japon durante la segunda guerra mundial) que estaban guardados en una casa del departamento Kagoshima.
					
					De esta manera, los reaccionarios japoneses tratan de ocultar las huellas criminales del trabajo forzoso y la masacre y desviar la atencion publica interior y exterior que urge la liquidacion de los crimines pasados.
					
					Los reaccionarios japoneses nunca ocultaran su proposito para inculcar el veneno del militarismo a todos los japoneses  camuflando con "patrimonios culturales" los hechos sobre la agresion y los crimenes.
